name: Contus Job Portal
tag_list: job-portal, job-portal-software, job-portal-script, job-portal-opensource-job-portal, php-job-portal, monster-jobs-clone, yahoo-hot-jobs-clone, career-builder-clone, clone-scripts, job-site-script
overview:
Start your own Monster Jobs or Yahoo Hot Jobs or Careerbuilder right away. All you got to do is to install our job board script and go live the next moment with the most advanced, latest, and sophisticated solution that you have ever witnessed. Find the features that wowed you when surfing in the leading job portal sites and make it yours.

General Features: The only product developed in ZEND Framework which gives highest level of security with optimized performance.

Easy-to-use navigational schemes and attractive user Interface.

Easy-to-use Web 2.0 Design with easy-to-read font, colors with bright and cheerful appeal.

SEO Friendly

Built with the best of breed features from, leading job sites. Support high volume of data seamlessly.

Compliance with web security Standards.

Fully accessible source code without any encryption except for License files can be customized by any PHP / Zend developers.
